hero.name: Daniel Serna
hero.title: Computing Systems Engineer
hero.description: I'm a passionate Computing Systems Engineer with a strong focus on web development and multi-platform applications.

about.title: Who Am I
about.content: I'm a Computing Systems Engineer with a passion for creating elegant solutions to complex problems.My journey in technology has been driven by curiosity and a constant desire to learn and innovate.With expertise spanning software development, system architecture, and emerging technologies, I thrive on challenges that push the boundaries of what's possible. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and building systems that scale.When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

soltec.short: Contributed to web development using Vue 3 js.

penteon.short: Contributed to the company web development and mobile app development using React js and React native.
penteon.developed1: Developed a mobile app for the company using react native and expo
penteon.developed2: Deployed the mobile app to the app store and play store
penteon.developed3: Implemented shacdn ui for the web app
penteon.developed4: Used zustand for state management in the web app
penteon.developed5: Implemented server actions using Next js

education.title: Education
education.content: Academic background in Computing Systems Engineering, with a focus on web development and multi-platform applications.
